items.label: AI-Robot Brain - Perception and Decision Making

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Textbook. This interactive textbook combines traditional learning materials with AI-powered features to enhance your understanding of physical AI concepts.

module-1/ros2.title: ROS 2 - Robot Operating System
module-1/ros2.description: ROS 2 (Robot Operating System 2) is a flexible framework for writing robot software. It's a collection of tools, libraries, and conventions that aim to simplify the task of creating complex and robust robot behavior across a wide variety of robot platforms.

module-2/digital-twin.title: Digital Twin - Simulation and Modeling
module-2/digital-twin.description: A digital twin is a virtual representation of a physical system that mirrors the real-world counterpart throughout its lifecycle. In robotics, digital twins are crucial for testing, validation, and optimization.

module-3/ai-robot-brain.title: AI-Robot Brain - Perception and Decision Making
module-3/ai-robot-brain.description: The AI-Robot Brain encompasses the perception and decision-making systems that allow robots to understand their environment and make intelligent choices. This is the core of autonomous behavior.

module-4/vla.title: Vision-Language-Action - Advanced Robotics Applications
module-4/vla.description: Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models represent the cutting edge of robotics AI, combining visual perception, language understanding, and action execution in unified models.
